hero.headline: Reduce system dependency without a risky replatform
hero.subheadline: We help operations leaders isolate one high-friction capability, run a controlled pilot, and scale only when evidence is clear.

pillars: Keep systems of record in place
Cut over with reconciliations and rollback gates
whatYouGet: A plain-language map of where dependency creates risk
A capability map with clear ownership, controls, and decisions
A sequenced pilot-to-cutover plan tied to business risk
Evidence gates leaders can use to approve, pause, or stop change

deliverables.title: Capability control map
deliverables.description: A cross-functional view of the capabilities that run the business, the systems that support them, and where control leaks.

deliverables.title: Stabilization plan
deliverables.description: Targeted interventions that stop spreadsheet sprawl, patch brittle handoffs, and reduce operational noise.

deliverables.title: Pilot design
deliverables.description: Parallel-run design with reconciliations and rollback triggers defined before execution.

deliverables.title: Cutover governance pack
deliverables.description: Decision checkpoints, approval criteria, and evidence expectations that keep change under executive control.
